Presenting at DSCNExt 2025

Taija

ICML 2024

``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.hero-banner-text} # News - I am officially on the job market and open to roles in industry, academia or both. If you think I might be a good fit for your organization, I'd love to chat! - ***Ph.D. Defence*** In February 2026, I will publicly defend my Ph.D. on Trustworthy AI in front of my supervisors and the following committee: prof. dr. ir. Jan H. Kwakkel (TU Delft), prof. dr. Iman P.P. van Lelyveld (VU Amsterdam, DNB), dr. Margaret Mitchell (Hugging Face, Inc.), prof. dr. Mykola Pechenizkiy (TU Eindhoven), dr. Flavia Barsotti (TU Delft, ING Bank). If you're interested in attending (including virtually) feel free to reach out. - My final PhD paper, *Counterfactual Training: Teaching Models Plausible and Actionable Explanations*, has been accepted for publication at IEEE SaTML 2026. We introduce a novel training regime that improves the explanatory capacity and adversarial robustness of neural networks. [[preprint](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.16205)] ::: ::: :::
